channel.title: Optimisation on Examined Algorithms
channel.description: Recent content in Optimisation on Examined Algorithms

item.title: Bayesian Decisions & Model Comparison
item.description: Without being overwhelmed we face an infinite horizon of future decisions. Most are made under uncertainty. A sequence of such decisions can compound or reduce that certainty, but we focus on the exaggerated drama of the momentous choice. Even when change is gradual and cumulative, history tells of a tale of pivot points, epic junctures and transformative events. Two paths diverge in a woods and we choose one. An array of possibilities suddenly open before us or collapse into a cul de sac.
